human_faced_rose.name: Human-faced Rose
human_faced_rose.description: A unique blue rose with red veins running across its petals, creating the illusion of a grinning human face. It emits an eerie illusion of laughter and crying intertwined.

wraith_dust.name: Ancient Wraith's Dust
wraith_dust.description: Remaining dust from an Ancient Wraith. It feels cold to the touch and seems to contain the echoes of forgotten memories.

lava_dragon_blood.name: Lava-dragon Blood
lava_dragon_blood.description: Glistening red liquid that remains hot even in freezing temperatures. Obtained from a Lava-dragon.

murloc_bladder.name: Murloc Bladder
murloc_bladder.description: A slippery, translucent organ from a Murloc. It has a faint salty smell.

dark_demonic_wolf_blood.name: Dark Demonic Wolf Blood
dark_demonic_wolf_blood.description: Deep black blood that feels heavy with ancient, dark energy.

spirit_world_plunderer_soul.name: Spirit World Plunderer True Soul Body
spirit_world_plunderer_soul.description: A palm-sized entity of coiled maggots resembling a human form, filled with colorless liquid and emitting black light bubbles.

lavos_squid_blood.name: Lavos Squid Blood
lavos_squid_blood.description: Striking blue blood that emits illusory bubbles. Must be stored in opaque containers.

starlight_insect.name: Starlight Insect
starlight_insect.description: An insect formed from resplendent starlight, its body forming a magical glow like illusory doors.

human_skinned_shadow_diamond.name: Human-skinned Shadow Characteristic
human_skinned_shadow_diamond.description: A massive diamond with numerous facets, each reflecting a different face.

magician_liquid.name: Translucent Magician Liquid
magician_liquid.description: A seemingly translucent liquid with intricate clarity levels that vary upon inspection.

magician_root.name: Magician's Heart-shaped Root
magician_root.description: A heart-shaped, brown root that resembles an old man's skin and exhibits slight vitality.

hound_of_fullgrim_blood.name: Hound of Fullgrim Blood
hound_of_fullgrim_blood.description: Thick, dark-red blood from a Hound of Fullgrim, pulsating with afterlife energy.

hound_of_fullgrim_eyeball.name: Hound of Fullgrim Eyeball
hound_of_fullgrim_eyeball.description: A dark-red eyeball that appears to be burning with internal flames.

demonic_wolf_of_fog_heart.name: Demonic Wolf of Fog Heart
demonic_wolf_of_fog_heart.description: A peculiar heart composed entirely of wisps of white mist.

bizarro_bane_eye.name: Bizarro Bane Main Eye
bizarro_bane_eye.description: The central eye of a Bizarro Bane, reflecting shifting, chaotic realities.

worm_of_time.name: Worm of Time
worm_of_time.description: A translucent worm with twelve transparent rings, shimmering with temporal power.

rainbow_salamander_gland.name: Rainbow Salamander Pituitary Gland
rainbow_salamander_gland.description: A palm-sized object constantly changing in color, filled with complex ridges.

illusory_chime_fruit.name: Illusory Chime Tree Fruit
illusory_chime_fruit.description: A fist-sized, colorless, translucent fruit that seems to ring faintly when moved.

manhal_fish_eyeball.name: Manhal Fish Eyeball
manhal_fish_eyeball.description: The crystal-clear eyeball of a matured Manhal Fish.

historical_papers.name: Stack of Historical Papers
historical_papers.description: Ancient, weathered papers that contain the weight of forgotten history.

crystalline_frost.name: Demonic Wolf Crystalline Frost
crystalline_frost.description: Ethereal frost that emanates freezing air and never melts.

sonia_golden_spring_water.name: Sonia Golden Spring Water
sonia_golden_spring_water.description: A pale gold liquid from Sonia Island that invokes a deep sense of thirst.

asmann_brain.name: Asmann Brain
asmann_brain.description: A grayish-white, translucent, and wrinkled brain that induces hallucinations if not contained.

six_winged_gargoyle_crystal.name: Six-Winged Gargoyle Core Crystal
six_winged_gargoyle_crystal.description: A grayish-white translucent crystal that served as the heart of a gargoyle.

naga_hair.name: Deep-sea Naga Hair
naga_hair.description: A dark blue hair strand that resembles a miniature snake.

blue_shadow_falcon_feather.name: Blue Shadow Falcon Crystalline Feather
blue_shadow_falcon_feather.description: A feather that glimmers with a faint azure light and feels as hard as crystal.

stone_golem_core.name: Stone Golem Core
stone_golem_core.description: The pulsating heart of a stone golem, radiating a sense of immense stability.

antique_mirror_500y.name: 500-year Antique Mirror
antique_mirror_500y.description: An antique mirror with a silver frame, over 500 years old. It seems to reflect a world that isn't quite our own.

murloc_gem_bladder.name: Murloc Gem Bladder
murloc_gem_bladder.description: A Murloc bladder containing a transparent gem-like object that emits azure light.

magma_elf_core.name: Magma Elf Core
magma_elf_core.description: A burning core from a Magma Elf, radiating intense heat and flickering with life.

black_hunting_spider_eye.name: Black Hunting Spider Eye
black_hunting_spider_eye.description: A cold, multi-faceted eye that seems to be constantly calculating its surroundings.

faded_egg_crystal.name: Faded Egg Crystal
faded_egg_crystal.description: Fragile egg-like crystals containing swishing water that never stops moving.

sunflower_black.name: Black-rimmed Sunflower
sunflower_black.description: A sunflower with petals tipped in deep black, radiating a strange, muted warmth.

sunflower_golden.name: Golden-rimmed Sunflower
sunflower_golden.description: A sunflower that glows with a brilliant golden light, even in total darkness.

sunflower_white.name: White-rimmed Sunflower
sunflower_white.description: A sunflower with pure white rims, symbolizing clarity and peace.

rosemary_needle.name: Mystical Rosemary Needle
rosemary_needle.description: Fragrant, evergreen needle-like leaves with white or blue flowers.

distilled_water_pure.name: Repeatedly Distilled Water
distilled_water_pure.description: Water of extreme purity, free of all contaminants and rich in mystical potential.

gemstone_powder.name: Fine Gemstone Powder
gemstone_powder.description: A shimmering powder derived from crushed mystical gemstones.

black_powder_mystic.name: Deep Black Mystic Powder
black_powder_mystic.description: A fine, deep black powder that feels strangely heavy and cold.

starlight_door_insect.name: Starlight Door Insect
starlight_door_insect.description: An insect shaped like a semi-circle, glowing with the light of illusory doors.

spirit_worm.name: Worm of Spirit
spirit_worm.description: A transparent maggot with three-dimensional patterns, carrying a sliver of spiritual essence.

rainbow_salamander_pituitary.name: Rainbow Salamander Pituitary
rainbow_salamander_pituitary.description: A soft, lustrous gland that shifts through every color of the rainbow.

manhal_fish_eye_matured.name: Matured Manhal Fish Eye
manhal_fish_eye_matured.description: A large, clear eye that seems to possess a gaze of its own.

dark_demonic_wolf_heart.name: Dark Demonic Wolf Heart
dark_demonic_wolf_heart.description: A blackened heart that still beats with a slow, ominous rhythm.

ancient_wraith_dust.name: Dust of Ancient Wraiths
ancient_wraith_dust.description: Dust gathered from the remains of an Ancient Wraith, cold and ephemeral.

lava_squid_blood_alt.name: Lavos Squid Blood (Refined)
lava_squid_blood_alt.description: Blue blood from a Lavos Squid, refined to maintain its spiritual properties.

interrogator_blood_venom.name: Interrogator's Blood Venom
interrogator_blood_venom.description: A highly toxic substance that induces numbness and compliance.

sheriff_badge_iron.name: Sheriff's Iron Badge
sheriff_badge_iron.description: An iron badge that carries the weight of authority and order.

gold_mint_leaves.name: Gold Mint Leaves
gold_mint_leaves.description: Leaves emitting a fresh and stimulating scent.

night_vanilla_liquids.name: Night Vanilla Liquids
night_vanilla_liquids.description: A herb native to the red moon, possessing unique properties. Its essence can be extracted and preserved as an essential oil for various uses.

redhair_birch_bark.name: Red-hair Birch Bark
redhair_birch_bark.description: The supplementary ingredient of the Bizarro Sorcerer potions.

dark_demonic_wolfs_blood.name: Dark Demonic Wolf's Blood
dark_demonic_wolfs_blood.description: A Deep black blood of the Dark Demonic Wolf.

humanfaced_rose_complete_stalk.name: Human-Faced Rose Complete Stalk
humanfaced_rose_complete_stalk.description: A unique blue rose with red veins running across its petals, creating the illusion of a grinning human face. It emits an eerie illusion of laughter and crying intertwined.

blackrimmed_sunflower_powder.name: Black-Rimmed Sunflower Powder
blackrimmed_sunflower_powder.description: The supplementary ingredient of the Clown potions.

spirit_world_plunderer_true_soul.name: Spirit World Plunderer True Soul
spirit_world_plunderer_true_soul.description: True Soul Body of a Spirit World Plunderer. A palm-sized entity comprised of coiled maggots resembling a human form, filled with colorless liquid. Bubbles emit black light, revealing intricate patterns and symbols embodying knowledge, power, transformation, secrets, strangeness, and madness.

thousandfaced_hunters_blood.name: Thousand-faced Hunter's Blood
thousandfaced_hunters_blood.description: A viscous liquid that could change its color based on the change of light.

remnant_spirituality_ofancient_wraiths.name:
Remnant Spirituality of
												Ancient Wraiths
remnant_spirituality_ofancient_wraiths.description: Phosphorescent spots floating within the tube exhibit a peculiar behavior upon contact with the glass wall. They expand, coalescing into a face with blurred features that morph into an open mouth, emitting a silent scream.

sixwinged_gargoyle_eyes.name: Six-Winged Gargoyle Eyes
sixwinged_gargoyle_eyes.description: An eyeball emitting a red glow,

dark_demonic_wolfs_heart.name: Dark Demonic Wolf's Heart
dark_demonic_wolfs_heart.description: A heart of the Dark Demonic Wolf.

fantasy_grass_essential_oil.name: Fantasy Grass Essential Oil
fantasy_grass_essential_oil.description: The supplementary ingredient of the Magician, Briber potions.

mutatedpituitary_gland_of_a_thousandface.name:
Mutated
												pituitary gland of a Thousand-faced Hunter
mutatedpituitary_gland_of_a_thousandface.description: Resembling a yellowish-brown peeled walnut with grooves and ridges reminiscent of a brain, this organ exhibits a constantly shifting appearance. At times, it appears gray and wrinkled, while at others, it becomes dark brown and extremely smooth. The colors intertwine, occasionally outlining a featureless face.

white_frost_crystal_ofdemonic_wolf_of_fo.name:
White Frost Crystal of
												Demonic Wolf of Fog
white_frost_crystal_ofdemonic_wolf_of_fo.description: A crystalline frost of the Demonic Wolf of Fog. It emanating cold air.

golden_cloak_grass_powder.name: Golden Cloak Grass Powder
golden_cloak_grass_powder.description: The supplementary ingredient of the Clown potions.

hound_of_fulgrim_blood.name: Hound of Fulgrim Blood
hound_of_fulgrim_blood.description: Thick, dark-red blood of the Hound of Fullgrim.

tornapple_jimsonweed_juice.name: Tornapple (Jimsonweed) Juice
tornapple_jimsonweed_juice.description: The supplementary ingredient of the Clown, Faceless, Witch potions.

spring_water_of_golden_spring.name: Spring Water of Golden Spring
spring_water_of_golden_spring.description: Also known as the Spring of the Elves and the Sonia Golden Springs. The spring water from Sonia Island. A pale gold liquid that spreads out slowly, maintaining a clear and transparent appearance. Its presence invokes a subconscious sense of thirst, as if one longs to drink a cup of it to quench their thirst.

spirit_world_plunderers_dust.name: Spirit World Plunderer's Dust
spirit_world_plunderers_dust.description: The remain dust of a Spirit World Plunderer.

star_crystal.name: Star Crystal
star_crystal.description: An exceptionally pure crystal with a gelatinous appearance reminiscent of Earthly jelly. Despite its lack of hardness, it reflects light in a mesmerizing manner, appearing to contain a luminous void of stars when illuminated by blue light. Its properties make it an ideal material for crafting divination crystals.

fingernailsized_selfmaderubber_mask.name:
Fingernail-Sized Self-made
												Rubber Mask
fingernailsized_selfmaderubber_mask.description: The supplementary ingredient of the Bizarro Sorcerer potions.

lavos_squids_crystallizedblood.name:
Lavos Squid's Crystallized
												Blood
lavos_squids_crystallizedblood.description: The blood of Lavos Squid's. The unique substance exhibits a striking blue hue. Occasionally, it emits illusory bubbles, suggestive of a connection to the spiritual realm. However, its distinctive properties degrade rapidly under sunlight, necessitating storage in opaque containers to preserve its unique qualities.

worm_of_star.name: Worm of Star
worm_of_star.description: An insect formed from resplendent starlight, its body is bent into a semi-circle, forming a magical glow that resembled illusory doors.

poison_hemlock.name: Poison Hemlock
poison_hemlock.description: A highly toxic substance that induces numbness throughout the body, potentially leading to death if ingested. Historically, it has been notorious as a method of suicide due to its potent effects.

humanskined_shadowscharacteristic.name:
Human-Skined Shadow's
												Characteristic
humanskined_shadowscharacteristic.description: A Characteristic of Human-Skinned Shadow. A massive diamond with numerous facets, each reflecting light to reveal a multitude of faces. The faces are densely packed, layered, and create a dizzying effect when observed.

dark_patterned_blackpanther_spinal_fluid.name:
Dark Patterned Black
												Panther Spinal Fluid
dark_patterned_blackpanther_spinal_fluid.description: A seemingly translucent liquid with intricate clarity levels, discernible upon close inspection. Transparency varies at different levels, satisfying those with obsessive-compulsive tendencies.

black_jimsonweed_juice.name: Black Jimsonweed Juice
black_jimsonweed_juice.description: The supplementary ingredient of the Faceless, Briber, Pleasure potions.

drago_bark.name: Drago Bark
drago_bark.description: The supplementary ingredient of the Marionettist potions.

mist_treants_true_root.name: Mist Treant's True Root
mist_treants_true_root.description: A heart-shaped, brown, palm-sized root, wrinkled in appearance resembling an old man's skin. Its back, however, is smooth and exquisite, akin to a gem. It exhibits slight expansion and contraction, suggesting a degree of vitality.

hornacis_gray_mountain_goat_horn.name: Hornacis Gray Mountain Goat Horn
hornacis_gray_mountain_goat_horn.description: A palm-sized horn from the gray mountain goat, resembling a miniature version of a typical goat horn. It is crystal clear, with swirling colors and faint layers of distinctive patterns.

mist_treant_juice.name: Mist Treant Juice
mist_treant_juice.description: A light green and sparkling, making it look very delicious.

hound_of_fulgrim_eyes.name: Hound of Fulgrim Eyes
hound_of_fulgrim_eyes.description: The Dark-red burning flames eyeballs of the Hound of Fullgrim.

demonic_wolf_of_fogstransformed_heart.name:
Demonic Wolf of Fog's
												Transformed Heart
demonic_wolf_of_fogstransformed_heart.description: A peculiar Demonic Wolf of Fog's heart composed of wisps of white mist.

bizarro_banes_main_eye.name: Bizarro Bane's Main Eye
bizarro_banes_main_eye.description: The main eye of Bizarro Bane.

droplet_gem_powder.name: Droplet Gem Powder
droplet_gem_powder.description: A fine powder derived from gemstones.

purified_water.name: Purified Water
purified_water.description: Water that has undergone repeated distillation, resulting in the removal of impurities and contaminants, leaving behind a high degree of purity.

dragon_tooth_grass_powder.name: Dragon Tooth Grass Powder
dragon_tooth_grass_powder.description: The supplementary ingredient of the Faceless, Telepathist potions.

sixwinged_gargoyles_corecrystal.name:
Six-Winged Gargoyle's Core
												Crystal
sixwinged_gargoyles_corecrystal.description: The core crystal of Six-Winged Gargoyle. A grayish-white translucent crystal, serving as the central crystalline structure of the Six-Winged Gargoyle.

deepsea_naga_hair_strand.name: Deep-sea Naga Hair Strand
deepsea_naga_hair_strand.description: A dark blue hair strand of Deep-sea Naga. It resembling miniature snakes.

golden_grapevines.name: Golden Grapevines
golden_grapevines.description: The supplementary ingredient of the Bizarro Sorcerer potions.

asmanns_complete_brain.name: Asmann's Complete Brain
asmanns_complete_brain.description: A complete brain of Asmann. The blob appeared as a grayish-white, translucent, and wrinkled object. Without the gold enclosing it, the brain of an Asmann would incessantly influence one, inducing hallucinations until mental faculties were lost.

hornbeam_essential_oils.name: Hornbeam Essential Oils
hornbeam_essential_oils.description: The supplementary ingredient of the Trickmaster, Reaper potions.

spirit_eaters_stomach_pouch.name: Spirit Eater's Stomach Pouch
spirit_eaters_stomach_pouch.description: The main ingredient of the Trickmaster potions.

string_grass_powder.name: String Grass Powder
string_grass_powder.description: The supplementary ingredient of the Trickmaster potions.

cursed_artifacts_of_anancient_wraith.name:
Cursed artifacts of an
												ancient wraith
cursed_artifacts_of_anancient_wraith.description: A cursed artifacts of an Ancient Wraiths.

meteorite_crystal.name: Meteorite Crystal
meteorite_crystal.description: The main ingredient of the Astrologer potions.

gregraces_left_claw.name: Gregrace's Left Claw
gregraces_left_claw.description: The left claw of the Phoenix Ancestor, Gregrace. Serves as an alternative for a Key of Stars Beyonder Characteristic.

worm_of_spirit.name: Worm of Spirit
worm_of_spirit.description: A transparent maggot with three-dimensional patterns. It serves as components of the Fool Pathway Mythical Creature Form. Each Worm of Spirit contains a part of the Spirit Body. The death of each Worm of Spirit causes damage to the Spirit Body.

deep_sea_marlins_blood.name: Deep Sea Marlin's Blood
deep_sea_marlins_blood.description: The main ingredient of the Trickmaster potions.

aurmirs_right_eye.name: Aurmir's Right Eye
aurmirs_right_eye.description: The right eye of the Giant King, Aurmir. Serves as an alternative for a Worm of Time Beyonder Characteristic.

rainbow_salamandercomplete_pituitary_gla.name:
Rainbow Salamander
												Complete Pituitary Gland
rainbow_salamandercomplete_pituitary_gla.description: A complete pituitary gland of Rainbow Salamander. A palm-sized object constantly changing in color, characterized by its soft texture, lustrous hues, and filled with ridges.

minddragons_complete_pituitary_gland_ado.name:
Mind
												Dragon's Complete Pituitary Gland (Adolescent)
minddragons_complete_pituitary_gland_ado.description: The main ingredient of the Hypnotist potions.

blackhunting_giantlizards_spinal_fluid.name:
Black-Hunting Giant
												Lizard's Spinal Fluid
blackhunting_giantlizards_spinal_fluid.description: The main ingredient of the Hypnotist potions.

tree_of_elders_fruit.name: Tree of Elder's Fruit
tree_of_elders_fruit.description: The main ingredient of the Psychiatrist potions.

pure_white_elf_flowers.name: Pure White Elf Flowers
pure_white_elf_flowers.description: The supplementary ingredient of the Telepathist potions.

mind_illusion_crystal.name: Mind Illusion Crystal
mind_illusion_crystal.description: The main ingredient of the Dreamwalker potions.

tree_mentors_golden_leaf.name: Tree Mentor's Golden Leaf
tree_mentors_golden_leaf.description: The supplementary ingredient of the Manipulator potions.

goathorned_blackfish_blood.name: Goat-Horned Blackfish Blood
goathorned_blackfish_blood.description: The main ingredient of the Spectator potions.

Mind Dragon's Complete
												Brain (Adult)
mind_dragons_completebrain_adult.description: The main ingredient of the Dreamwalker potions.

mind_dragons_blood_adult.name: Mind Dragon's Blood (Adult)
mind_dragons_blood_adult.description: The supplementary ingredient of the Dreamwalker potions.

cow_teeth_paeonol_powder.name: Cow Teeth Paeonol Powder
cow_teeth_paeonol_powder.description: The supplementary ingredient of the Spectator potions.

drop_of_tears.name: Drop of Tears
drop_of_tears.description: Drop of tears from different creatures that were shed due to intense emotion

mind_dragons_completebrain_elderly.name:
Mind Dragon's Complete
												Brain (Elderly)
mind_dragons_completebrain_elderly.description: The main ingredient of the Manipulator potions.

mirror_dragons_eyes.description: The main ingredient of the Psychiatrist potions.

mirror_dragons_blood.name: Mirror Dragon's Blood
mirror_dragons_blood.description: The supplementary ingredient of the Psychiatrist potions.

dream_catchers_heart.description: The main ingredient of the Dreamwalker potions.

tree_mentor_crystalline_heart.description: The main ingredient of the Manipulator potions.

mind_dragons_blood_elderly.description: The supplementary ingredient of the Manipulator potions.

autumn_crocus_essence.description: The supplementary ingredient of the Spectator potions.

chestnut_spore.description: The supplementary ingredient of the Telepathist potions.

illusory_chime_trees_fruit.description: A fist-sized, colorless, translucent fruit of the Illusory Chime Tree.

farsman_rabbits_spinal_fluid.description: The main ingredient of the Telepathist potions.

elf_flower_petals.name: Elf Flower Petals
elf_flower_petals.description: The supplementary ingredient of the Spectator potions.

matured_manhal_fishs_eyeball.description: An eyeball of matured Manhal Fish.

crystal_sunflower.name: Crystal Sunflower
crystal_sunflower.description: The main ingredient of the Bard potions.

adult_flint_birds_tail_feather.name: Adult Flint Bird's Tail Feather
adult_flint_birds_tail_feather.description: The main ingredient of the Bard potions.

july_wine_juice.description: The supplementary ingredient of the Bard potions.

mirror_hedgehog_blood.description: The main ingredient of the Light Supplicant potions.

powder_of_dazzling_soul.description: The main ingredient of the Light Supplicant potions.

												Juice

magma_heart_powder.description: The supplementary ingredient of the Unshadowed potions.

fingered_citron_powder.description: The supplementary ingredient of the Solar High Priest potions.

rosemary.name: Rosemary
rosemary.description: A shrub with fragrant, evergreen, needle-like leaves and white, pink, purple, or blue flowers.

solidified_magma.description: The supplementary ingredient of the Solar High Priest potions.

dawn_roosters_red_comb.description: The main ingredient of the Solar High Priest potions.

red_wine.description: The supplementary ingredient of the Briber, Hunter, Secrets Suppliant, Listener, Bard, Light Suppliant, Midnight Poet potions.

holy_brilliance_rock_liquid.description: The supplementary ingredient of the Unshadowed potions.

goldenrimmed_sunflower.description: The supplementary ingredient of the Light Supplicant potions.

holy_brilliance_rock.description: The main ingredient of the Unshadowed potions.

golden_blood_of_the_sun_god.description: The main ingredient of the Unshadowed potions.

Tree of Elder's Crystalized
												Roots
tree_of_elders_crystalizedroots.description: The main ingredient of the Notary potions.

sun_divine_birds_tail_feather.description: The main ingredient of the Unshadowed potions.

king_of_dawn_roosters_blood.name: King of Dawn Roosters' Blood
king_of_dawn_roosters_blood.description: The supplementary ingredient of the Priest of Light potions.

rock_water.name: Rock Water
rock_water.description: The supplementary ingredient of the Priest of Light potions.

fingered_citron_juice.name: Fingered Citron Juice
fingered_citron_juice.description: The supplementary ingredient of the Priest of Light potions.

king_of_dawn_roosters_red_comb.name: King of Dawn Roosters' Red Comb
king_of_dawn_roosters_red_comb.description: The main ingredient of the Priest of Light potions.

elf_dark_leaf.name: Elf Dark Leaf
elf_dark_leaf.description: The supplementary ingredient of the Light Supplicant potions.

aconite_juice.name: Aconite Juice
aconite_juice.description: The supplementary ingredient of the Light Supplicant potions.

sun_essential_oil.name: Sun Essential Oil
sun_essential_oil.description: Extracted from a combination of black-rimmed sunflower, golden-rimmed sunflower, and white-rimmed sunflower.

brilliance_rock.name: Brilliance Rock
brilliance_rock.description: The main ingredient of the Light Supplicant potions.

aqua_fern_juice.name: Aqua Fern Juice
aqua_fern_juice.description: The supplementary ingredient of the Notary potions.

midsummer_grass.name: Midsummer Grass
midsummer_grass.description: The supplementary ingredient of the Bard potions.

singing_sunflower.name: Singing Sunflower
singing_sunflower.description: The main ingredient of the Bard potions.
